title: Collaboration-Based Elementary AI Education Design: Strategies for Bridging Gender Gaps

context.prior_knowledge: Basic AI Concepts and General Understanding of Primary Education Environments
context.additional_context: A Course for Office/Administrative Learners to Cultivate Competencies in Designing Elementary AI Education Curricula. Includes Smartphone-Based Tasks and Offline Collaborative Activities

learning_goals: Learners can design gender-balanced experiential AI educational activities suitable for elementary learners
Learners develop educational scenarios reflecting gender sensitivity in collaborative learning environments
Learners apply methods for creating and evaluating AI educational materials using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
